mapper.insert: insert into property_device (id, kind, category_id, name, property, remark) values (#{propertyDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update property_device set kind = #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{propertyDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, property = #{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{propertyDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from property_device
where property_device.category_id != 0
where property_device.category_id = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into property_device
kind,
category_id,
name,
property,
remark,
#{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update property_device
property_device.kind = #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER},
property_device.category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
property_device.name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
property_device.property = #{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
property_device.remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where property_device.id = #{propertyDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from property_device
and property_device.category_id != 0
and property_device.category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and property_device.name like concat('%', #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and property_device.property like concat('%', #{propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
select * from property_device where property_device.kind = #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER} and property_device.category_id = 0
select * from property_device where property_device.category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and property_device.category_id != 0

SELECT d.id AS d_id, d.category_id AS d_category_id, d.NAME AS d_name, d.total AS d_total, d.piece AS d_piece, d.remain AS d_remain, d.OWNER AS d_owner, d.kind AS d_kind, pd.id AS pd_id, pd.kind AS pd_kind, pd.category_id AS pd_category_id, pd.NAME AS pd_name, pd.property AS pd_property, pd.remark AS pd_remark FROM `property_device` pd, device d WHERE pd.category_id = 0 AND pd.id = d.category_id

select * from property_device
and property_device.category_id = 0
and property_device.name like concat('%', #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
